title: Radio astronomy in Australia
brief_description: The study of radio waves which celestial bodies emit and what these waves tell of the size, composition, temperature and other characteristics of these bodies. Deals with Australia’s contribution in the field and indicates the equipment involved, including the construction of a giant radio telescope.
